name: Quick Chicken and Rice Noodle Stir-Fry
instructions: Soak rice noodles in hot water for 12-15 minutes.
Butterfly a chicken breast and slice into thin strips.
Heat olive oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat.
Add chicken to the pan and season with salt and pepper.
Once seared, add garlic and spread chicken and garlic up the sides of the pan to crisp.
Remove chicken and broccoli from the pan and wipe it clean.
Add a teaspoon of olive oil to the pan.
Whisk two eggs and spread them thinly in the pan.
Add noodles, chicken, and broccoli to the pan and mix well.
The egg should bind the dish together.
